channel.title: How do you
channel.description:
How do you put to forums together so they work together
say i went to one of them you look at the people online and you go to the other forum and it has the same amount and same people online(cause the forums are connected together).
how do i connect my two forums together?

item.title: How do you
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:

[quote=“N00b1, post:10, topic:119681”][quote author=sp00nkitty link=topic=169099.msg1570521#msg1570521 date=1183637287]
can someone tell me a well explained way of doing this properly notl ike fr33scap3s way as his way doesnt work
[/quote]
there is a tut on how to do it if you look =/[/quote]
its bugged.

and duh you need to re upload the files >.<

Read full topic

item.title: How do you
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

[quote=“Fr33sc4p3, post:2, topic:119681”]Well, i have found one way of doing it on smf.

You can set up the 2 forums, the first forum with the prefix smf_ or smf1_
Then the second one with Smf2_ all on the same database

Then in the second forums Sources folder, in every file in there replace {$db_prefix}members with the prefix of the first forums say if you picked smf_ then replace all the {$db_prefix}members with smf_members.

Then re-upload al the Sources files and then your members table should be fused, then you can do the same with other tables in the SQL database.

Search for {$db_prefix}instant_messages and replace all with smf_instant_messages, meaning the instant messages should be fused, you can do it with other things like Karma as well.[/quote]thanks so much fr33sc4p3 im gonna try it now ill let you know if it worked

Read full topic

item.title: How do you
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well, i have found one way of doing it on smf.

You can set up the 2 forums, the first forum with the prefix smf_ or smf1_
Then the second one with Smf2_ all on the same database

Then in the second forums Sources folder, in every file in there replace {$db_prefix}members with the prefix of the first forums say if you picked smf_ then replace all the {$db_prefix}members with smf_members.

Then re-upload al the Sources files and then your members table should be fused, then you can do the same with other tables in the SQL database.

Search for {$db_prefix}instant_messages and replace all with smf_instant_messages, meaning the instant messages should be fused, you can do it with other things like Karma as well.

Read full topic
